page.title: 03 The Survey Itself
page.content:
We based our survey by compiling and using a questionaire method.This method involved group discussion in the classroom covering many different aspects. The survey also included a morning's field trip to the designated area and an afternoon of research at our local library.Both the morning and afternoon proved to be most successful and were enjoyed by all. Our questionaire consisted of four different categories :
{1. The Home. {2. Life style. {3. Occupation. {4. Attitudes.
